TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Tundra Exploration - v7.0 (Nov 5th, 2023) - (Re)Stockalike SpaceX Falcon 9, (Crew) Dragon (XL) & Haven-1!

Articles.Content:
Tundra Exploration v5.0
has been released with A LOT of new stuff!

Many thanks to @ValiZockt for making many new plugin additions to improve the gameplay experience.

Version 5.0.0:
- Added Gigan XL parts
- Added TundraExploration.dll plugin by Vali
- Added ModuleTundraRaptor to gimbal out of the way (action group)
- Added ModuleTundraRCSAnimation for your every day warning needs
- Added ModuleTundraEngineSwitch for all your 3 engine landing needs
- Added a new decouple module for your Ghidorah Heavy decouple needs
- Added a new plugin to actuate Gojira fins
- Added new soot levels on Ghidorah
- Added waterfall configs to Rodan
- Added real names config by Jeronimo
- Tweaked Gigan solar panel colors
- Tweaked Rodan docking port texture
- ModuleSootyShader is now ModuleTundraSoot
- Fixed Falcon 1 fairing side tech tree to Basic Rocketry
- Fixed Rodan re-entry orientation
- Removed Mk3 stuff from configs
- Removed old plugin

Download links in the OP.

Happy launches!!

Gojira Mk 5 (SN15), LADEE, and Octopus Revamp were moved from V5.0 to V6.0. I guess Damon changed their mind about what should be in the update. We appreciate it though! Better to have a bunch of new content now so that we can get used to the new parts than to have a ton of new stuff all at once.

I am still working on Mk5. Although these new updates have been finished already and I didn’t really saw a point in waiting much longer

Some things broke (at least in my game) with the newest update, specifically action groups as shown in the picture. I had 1,2,3,4 set to control each flap, and then brakes to toggle yaw pitch and roll. but all those are gone and the names for yaw pitch and roll are broken for some reason.

@TomfooleryYT, the action groups are gone, as a new fins module was introduced. So that is expected.

Nevertheless, It seems like KSP can't find the specified localisation strings. Which game version you're running? There may were some changes on SQUADs side between updates. If that is the case best is to dump localisation and just use english titles for the next update, if that's not the case try verifying your files via Steam.

I've been using 1.8.1 for.... a long time now. it's just the best one for all of the mods that I'm using.

I will say, it looks like the fins work better than they used to, so kudos for that. but the starships did lose a lot of their maneuverability due to my action groups being deleted.

  • TE_19_F9_S1_Engine.cfg
  • TE_19_F9_S1_Engine.dds
  • TE_19_F9_S1_Engine.mu

Is there a texture folder that I should be keeping so I can keep the texture.

I don't know what happened but...

Last night I could land my Starship without Ferram Aerospace Research, I used to have it installed and I recall being able to land it anyway. I just uninstalled FAR because it was messing up with the Trajectories mod, which I very much need to land right on the spot calculating the drag force. So I decided to uninstall it and all perfect, just last night that made possible a perfect landing.

PROBLEM VIDEO WITH STARSHIP REENTRY WITH FAR: https://youtu.be/cFINHV6WdQo

HOWEVER, the Super Heavy doesn't seem to do very well without FAR, every time I'd set up a Mechjeb landing, starts burning all engines, then I'd change to the center only option.... it just won't handdle it, crashes into the ground lighting up the engines too late.

So my question is... Why was I able to land the Starship with FAR before and no longer can I?

I have two options... to find a solution to land Starship or to find one for landing Super Heavy...

 

Help?

The Starship controls are changed. It works much better now in stock but it needs way more tweaking. FAR is still not supported by default.
